alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Union; Hudson; Western Essex; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:18PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, Union, Essex and Richmond Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Brunswick, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Elizabeth, Bayonne, Plainfield, Linden, Orange, Summit, Millburn, Harrison, Todt Hill, Caldwell, Huguenot, Port Richmond and Kearny. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Essex; Eastern Union; Hudson; Western Essex; Western Union
